item.title: Stylish Woocommerce
item.dc:creator: exporter
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row text_align="center" type="image" bg_position="center" bg_position_horizontal="center" bg_image="7920"][vc_column][kleo_visibility type="hidden-xs"][kleo_gap size="200px"][/kleo_visibility][vc_column_text animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"]

Wanna shop?

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][kleo_search_form form_style="transparent" context="product,portfolio" placeholder="e.g. 'kleo'"][kleo_gap size="30px"][vc_column_text lead="yes" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"]On this demo page you can search for products and portfolio items only. You can easily configure the search shortcode to get different content type like members, posts, pages, forums, products, portfolio on this [kleo_button title="DEMO PAGE" href="http://seventhqueen.com/themes/kleo/pinterest/" target="_self" style="see-through" size="lg" tooltip_position="left" tooltip_action="hover"][/vc_column_text][kleo_visibility type="hidden-xs"][kleo_gap size="300px"][/kleo_visibility][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" type="color" padding_top="30" padding_bottom="10"][vc_column][kleo_clients number="6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" text_align="center" type="color" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0"][vc_column][kleo_divider text="Kleo is trusted by 73,000+ clients and companies worldwide"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" padding_top="100" padding_bottom="100" el_class="col dark"][vc_column][vc_column_text animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"]

A Premium Multi-Purpose WooCommerce Theme

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text lead="yes" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="bottom-to-top"]KLEO is not just a shop where you come and like all what you see but a true template that you can also use to develop your own business. Empowered with latest technology features and build with a lot of attention to details KLEO is the perfect Starter Kit you ever need.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="80px"][kleo_grid type="4" animation="yes" colored_icons="yes" bordered_icons="yes"][kleo_feature_item title="Unique Design" icon="html5-1" icon_position="center"]Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Extremely Flexible" icon="beaker" icon_position="center"]Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="Outstanding Support" icon="umbrella" icon_position="center"]Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.[/kleo_feature_item][kleo_feature_item title="FREE Updates" icon="download-cloud" icon_position="center"]Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium.[/kleo_feature_item][/kleo_grid][kleo_gap size="40px"][kleo_button title="VIEW ALL FEATURES" href="#features" style="see-through" size="lg" el_class="kleo-scroll-to"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" type="color" bg_color="#000000" column_gap="no" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="7922" img_size="full" full_width="yes"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][kleo_portfolio display_type="overlay" columns="2" item_count="4" filter="no" image_size="large"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id="features" text_align="center" type="color" bg_color="#f7f7f9" vertical_align="yes" border="bottom"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation="animate-when-almost-visible"]

Highlight title for this section

[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap][vc_column_text lead="yes" animation="animate-when-almost-visible"]I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="7923" img_size="full" alignment="center" animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="el-appear"][kleo_pin type="circle" top="24%" right="30%" tooltip="popover" tooltip_position="top" tooltip_title="Sofa feature 1" tooltip_text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua." animation="animate-when-visible" css_animation="pulsate"][kleo_pin type="circle" left="41%" bottom="25%" tooltip="popover" tooltip_position="right" tooltip_title="Metalic feature 1" tooltip_text="Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur." animation="animate-when-visible" css_animation="el-appear"][kleo_pin type="circle" left="21%" bottom="36%" tooltip="popover" tooltip_position="top" tooltip_title="Sofa feature 2" tooltip_text="Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum., sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua." animation="animate-when-visible" css_animation="el-appear"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row text_align="center" vertical_align="yes" padding_top="80" border="bottom" el_class="col dark"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text][featured_products per_page="3" columns="3" order_by="date" order="desc"][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text animation="animate-when-almost-visible" css_animation="left-to-right"]

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.[/vc_column_text][kleo_gap size="30px"][kleo_button title="View All Products" style="see-through" size="lg" tooltip="popover" tooltip_title="Hi there!" tooltip_text="This is just a demo page to illustrate how easy you can start a Multipurpose Shoping based website"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="footer-1"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="footer-2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="footer-3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_widget_sidebar sidebar_id="footer-4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row inner_container="no" padding_bottom="0"][vc_column][kleo_divider text="You’ll be informed about updates, special offers and planned changes to KLEO."][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type="color" padding_top="30" padding_bottom="50"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" font_color="#99969c"][vc_column_text]

Subscribe to the weekly featured products

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][mc4wp_form][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
